name: Memory Leak (Cryo)
description:
Memory Leak is a Game based on Blocky's way of finding the Disk needed for its PC repairs, he is Currently Suffering from Short Term memory loss, your goal now is to help him find it! don't hesitate to have a Wonder around his house! don't run too much tho! it would cause a lot of ruckuses!

Global Game Jam's theme was Lost and Found, and thus this game is based on that, I also limited myself to a Cubed themed game.
